SectionHowItWorks.createListingLink: PS. You can also add your pub on Whichost in just a few clicks! Click here to get started.
SectionHowItWorks.part1Text: Start by searching for a location. Once you find a pub you like, request a booking and make a secure payment right away.
SectionHowItWorks.part2Text: Once the request has been accepted you can invite your friends and enjoy your party.
SectionHowItWorks.part3Text: After enjoying the experience, let others know by reviewing your host. Help others know where to go.
